00019 #include <iostream>
00020 #include <cstring>
00021 #include <cstdlib>
00038 inline bool MyAssertFunction( bool b, 
00039                        const char* desc, 
00040                        int line, 
00041                        const char* file, 
00042                        const char *exp )
00043 {
00044         if (b) return true;
00045         std::cerr << "\n\nAssertion Failure\n";
00046         std::cerr << "Expression  : " << exp  << std::endl;
00047         std::cerr << "Description : " << desc << std::endl;
00048         std::cerr << "Filename    : " << file << std::endl;
00049         std::cerr << "Line No     : " << line << std::endl;
00050         std::exit(1);
00051         return false;
00052 }
00053 
00054 // NDEBUG is standard C++ used with assert.h
00055 #if defined( NDEBUG )
00056 #define Assert( exp, description ) MyAssertFunction( (bool)(exp), description, __LINE__, __FILE__, #exp )
00057 #else
00058 #define Assert( exp, description )
00059 #endif
